mapper.update: update t_node set source = #{source}, flag = #{flag} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete a, b from t_node a, t_node_detail b where a.id = b.node_id
mapper.insert: insert into t_node_detail (node_id, ip, port,uuid, alterId,security,network,remarks,camouflage_type,camouflage_host,camouflage_path,camouflage_tls,type ) values (#{nodeId}, #{ip}, #{port},#{uuid}, #{alterId}, #{security}, #{network}, #{remarks}, #{camouflageType}, #{camouflageHost}, #{camouflagePath}, #{camouflageTls}, 'v2ray')
insert into t_node_detail (node_id, ip, port,security,password, remarks, type) values (#{nodeId}, #{ip}, #{port}, #{security},#{password}, #{remarks},'ss')
mapper.select: select id ,node_id as nodeId, ip, port, remarks,security,type,password from t_node_detail where ip = #{ip} and port = #{port}
mapper.insert: insert into t_node_detail (node_id, ip, port,security,password, remarks,obfs,obfsParam,protocol,protoParam, type) values (#{nodeId}, #{ip}, #{port}, #{security},#{password}, #{remarks},#{obfs},#{obfsparam}, #{protocol}, #{protoparam}, 'ssr')
mapper.select: select id, subscribeId, flag, `key`, kind from t_subscribe_key_config where flag = 1
